titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (MALFORMATIONS QUESTION B) - Description

div.p: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (MALFORMATIONS QUESTION B) is the PERSON SCORE for question B of the Malformations section of the TPRG-SEND Two Year Corrected Age Outcome Assessment.
The question asks "Does this malformation impair daily activities despite assistance?".
